data.title: Masood Habib – FAST NUCES
data.text:
Publications

Murthy, “Machine Learning Based Healthcare System for Investigating the Association Between Depression and Quality of Life,” in IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics, vol. 26, no. 5, pp. 2008-2019, May 2022, doi: 10.1109/JBHI.2022.3140433. (IF= 7.021)
